items.sentence: This sound will eventually drive you up a wall.
I'd like to take this car out for a test drive.
Tom is in the front yard, playing with the dog.
I wonder how much it costs to fumigate a house.
It's not difficult to see why that's happening.
Tom was able to find the money that I'd hidden.
Our two teams will face each other next Monday.
I think that Tom is beginning to lose his mind.
I had no idea you were having trouble with Tom.
I had no idea that you didn't know how to swim.
I had no idea that you were so good at cooking.
Tom says that he has no idea what he should do.
